subject: Golf
Tennis
Trees and Shrubs
lead_paragraph: What truly dances in the mind’s eye as March comes to a close was the creative work done under duress in Florida this past week by Sergio García and Agnieszka Radwanska.
snippet: What truly dances in the mind’s eye as March comes to a close was the creative work done under duress in Florida this past week by Sergio García and Agnieszka Radwanska.
